p.s: The given scene is taken from the movie The Hate U Give directed by George Tillmann Jr. and published in 2018 which tells the story of a black girl named Starr who matched her childhood best friend get killed by a white police officer.
The scene starts off with the Carter family eating dinner in a restaurant after Starr gave her interview on TVtelevision.
Subsequently the scene switches to the outside of the restaurant where a gang and their leader is waiting for them.
Maverick Carter goes outside to face them and gets in a fight with them.
The fight gets interrupted by a police car driving by and stopping them.
Afterwards the police officers took Maverick to a wall and ask him for his IDidentification.
After realising that Starr is the witness of a case that involved police brutal they let Maverick go.
Finally the scene ends with the family reuniting.
